languages.text: "В таком случае отрадно, что я не еретик, как вы, несомненно, знаете. Я буду уповать на ваше милосердие, Ваша Светлость". {n}Ризза мрачно улыбается, растерянно поднося дрожащей рукой ко рту опустевший стакан в попытке скрыть свое волнение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "В таком случае отрадно, что я не еретик, как вы, несомненно, знаете. Я буду уповать на ваше милосердие, Ваша Светлость". {n}Ризза мрачно улыбается, растерянно поднося дрожащей рукой ко рту опустевший стакан в попытке скрыть свое волнение.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Good thing I'm not a heretic then, as you doubtlessly know. I'll be putting my hopes in your mercy, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship." {n}Ryzza smiles darkly, trying to hide her agitation and bewilderment, as her trembling hand brings an empty glass to her lips.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В таком случае отрадно, что я не еретик, как вы, несомненно, знаете. Я буду уповать на ваше милосердие, Ваша Светлость". {n}Ризза мрачно улыбается, растерянно поднося дрожащей рукой ко рту опустевший стакан в попытке скрыть свое волнение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Good thing I'm not a heretic then, as you doubtlessly know. I'll be putting my hopes in your mercy, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship." {n}Ryzza smiles darkly, trying to hide her agitation and bewilderment, as her trembling hand brings an empty glass to her lips.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: “幸好我不是异端分子，这一点你再清楚不过了。我愿意把希望寄托在你的仁慈上，大人。”{n}莱萨露出了阴暗的笑容，试图掩饰她的不安与迷茫。她的手颤抖着，将早已喝光了酒的酒杯送到嘴边。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Good thing I'm not a heretic then, as you doubtlessly know. I'll be putting my hopes in your mercy, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship." {n}Ryzza smiles darkly, trying to hide her agitation and bewilderment, as her trembling hand brings an empty glass to her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “幸好我不是异端分子，这一点你再清楚不过了。我愿意把希望寄托在你的仁慈上，大人。”{n}莱萨露出了阴暗的笑容，试图掩饰她的不安与迷茫。她的手颤抖着，将早已喝光了酒的酒杯送到嘴边。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: 「異端者じゃなくてよかったです。まぁ、お分かりだったと思いますが。陛下の慈悲には希望を抱いていますよ、陛下」{n}リザは暗い顔で笑い、ためらいと驚きの感情を隠すべく、震える手で空のグラスを唇に運んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Good thing I'm not a heretic then, as you doubtlessly know. I'll be putting my hopes in your mercy, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship." {n}Ryzza smiles darkly, trying to hide her agitation and bewilderment, as her trembling hand brings an empty glass to her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「異端者じゃなくてよかったです。まぁ、お分かりだったと思いますが。陛下の慈悲には希望を抱いていますよ、陛下」{n}リザは暗い顔で笑い、ためらいと驚きの感情を隠すべく、震える手で空のグラスを唇に運んだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: «Menos mal que no soy una hereje entonces, como ya sabe. Depositaré mis esperanzas en su misericordia, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Ryzza sonríe intentando ocultar su agitación y desconcierto mientras su mano temblorosa se lleva un vaso vacío a los labios.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Good thing I'm not a heretic then, as you doubtlessly know. I'll be putting my hopes in your mercy, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship." {n}Ryzza smiles darkly, trying to hide her agitation and bewilderment, as her trembling hand brings an empty glass to her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Menos mal que no soy una hereje entonces, como ya sabe. Depositaré mis esperanzas en su misericordia, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Ryzza sonríe intentando ocultar su agitación y desconcierto mientras su mano temblorosa se lleva un vaso vacío a los labios.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Dann ist es ja gut, dass ich keine Ketzerin bin, wie Ihr zweifellos wisst. Ich setze meine Hoffnung in Eure Gnade, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft." {n}Ryzza lächelt düster und versucht, ihre Unruhe und Fassungslosigkeit zu verbergen, während sie mit zitternder Hand ein leeres Glas an ihre Lippen führt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Good thing I'm not a heretic then, as you doubtlessly know. I'll be putting my hopes in your mercy, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship." {n}Ryzza smiles darkly, trying to hide her agitation and bewilderment, as her trembling hand brings an empty glass to her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dann ist es ja gut, dass ich keine Ketzerin bin, wie Ihr zweifellos wisst. Ich setze meine Hoffnung in Eure Gnade, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft." {n}Ryzza lächelt düster und versucht, ihre Unruhe und Fassungslosigkeit zu verbergen, während sie mit zitternder Hand ein leeres Glas an ihre Lippen führt.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: « Eh bien, heureusement que je ne suis pas une hérétique, comme vous le savez certainement. Je vais prier pour votre clémence, Votre Seigneurie, » {n}répond Ryzza avec un sourire sombre pour tenter de masquer son anxiété, tout en portant de ses mains tremblantes son verre vide à ses lèvres.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Good thing I'm not a heretic then, as you doubtlessly know. I'll be putting my hopes in your mercy, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship." {n}Ryzza smiles darkly, trying to hide her agitation and bewilderment, as her trembling hand brings an empty glass to her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, heureusement que je ne suis pas une hérétique, comme vous le savez certainement. Je vais prier pour votre clémence, Votre Seigneurie, » {n}répond Ryzza avec un sourire sombre pour tenter de masquer son anxiété, tout en portant de ses mains tremblantes son verre vide à ses lèvres.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Neyse ki kâfir değilim. Tabii bunu sen de biliyorsun. Yapacak bir şey yok, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin merhametine sığınacağız artık. {n}Ryzza gülümsüyor. Bir yandan titreyen eliyle boş bardağını dudaklarına götürürken diğer yandan gerginliğini ve şaşkınlığını bu tebessümle gizlemeye çalışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Good thing I'm not a heretic then, as you doubtlessly know. I'll be putting my hopes in your mercy, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship." {n}Ryzza smiles darkly, trying to hide her agitation and bewilderment, as her trembling hand brings an empty glass to her lips.{/n}
